July 21, 1894 D Scarborough Contest

Bellini [arr. Round]
Scarborough, North Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes: £30 and Yorkshire Challenge Cup, £20, £15, £5, £2 10s. Uniform prize: Black Dyke March contest: 1. Besses, 2. Black Dyke Solo cornet contest: 1. J. Billam (Kingston), 2. Percy Turner (Wyke), 3. H. Bower (Black Dyke) 5 bands competed
